name: py-smart-open

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
smart_open is a Python 2 & Python 3 library for efficient streaming of
very large files from/to S3, HDFS, WebHDFS, HTTP, or local storage. It
supports transparent, on-the-fly (de-)compression for a variety of
different formats.

dependencies.name: py-azure-common

dependencies.description: Microsoft Azure Core Library for Python.

dependencies.description: Microsoft Azure Blob Storage Client Library for Python

dependencies.name: py-boto
dependencies.description:
Boto is a Python package that provides interfaces to Amazon Web
Services.

dependencies.name: py-google-cloud-storage
dependencies.description: Google Cloud Storage API client library.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-gensim
dependent_to.description:
Gensim is a Python library for topic modelling, document indexing and
similarity retrieval with large corpora. Target audience is the natural
language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR) community.

dependent_to.name: snakemake
dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.

dependent_to.name: py-pathy
dependent_to.description: pathlib.Path subclasses for local and cloud bucket storage

dependent_to.name: py-ray
dependent_to.description:
Ray provides a simple, universal API for building distributed
applications.
